Description:

Attending Site survey with clients / Contractors, Prepare Cost and estimation, Preparation of AutoCAD Drawings, Heat Load Calculation for approval

coordinate with site team, technicians, staff and other tradesmen.
Arranging site meetings, Prepare work schedules, assign work to staff & technicians etc.
Should be fluent in English, have minimum of 3 years local experience,Skills
